############
Installation
############

Stable (2.x)
============

From PyPI
---------

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install -U masogram

From Arch Linux Repository
--------------------------

.. code-block:: bash

    pacman -S python-masogram

Development build (3.x)
=======================

From PyPI
-----------------------

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install -U --pre masogram

From GitHub
-----------

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install https://github.com/masogram/masogram/archive/refs/heads/dev-3.x.zip

From AUR
--------

.. code-block:: bash

    yay -S python-masogram3
